ValidationRule.description: Requires you to specify either a set of base endpoints or named credentials.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ISBLANK( Base_Endpoint__c ), ISBLANK( Named_Credential__c )), AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Base_Endpoint__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Named_Credential__c))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify either a base endpoint or a named credential to be used.
